Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power
Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI

Product Description

Soulaca new model 22″ with full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use. Nowadays, more and more people like to watch TV while tasting wine while taking a bath in the bathroom. Soulaca TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don‚Äôt feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Soulaca HUAYU Series

Freeview (Digital) TV: Yes DTV System: ATSC/DVB-T/DVB-T2/DVB-C/DVB-S/DVB-S2 (According to your country) Freeview (Digital) Radio: Yes Analogue Tuner: Yes Internet Specs: RAM: 1G; Storage: 8G; WiFi: 2.4G/5G Display Type: LED Aspect Ratio:16:9, Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 Brightness (cd/m¬≤): 250 Resolution: 1920 x 1080; Display Colors:16.7M; View Angle (¬∞H/V):178/178 Speakers:8Œ©5W x 2 Main Power:12V; Power Consumption(W): 23W; Standby Consumption(W): <1 Front Panel Finish: Mirror Frame: Metal Front Panel: Glass Ports and Connectors: TV, HDMI*1, USB*1, Audio Output,LAN(RJ45) , touchscreen Working Humidity: 10%-90% Working Temperature: -10¬∞C ~ +50¬∞C Unit Size (mm) (W x H x D): 501W x 316H x 43Dmm /19.7″W x 12.44″H x 1.69″D Android Version: 7.1 Package Includes: TV, IP68 TV Remote, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set Unit Weight(kg): 5.2 Gross Weight(kg): 8

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

Screen Casting-Supprot Android Phone& iPhone

IP66 rated waterproof. Whether you want to wash with soap operas or primp with prime time, a waterproof TV in the bathroom can help you enjoy the time.

Most of the mirror TV in the market the brightness is very weak. But ours improve the glass quality, which make the TV image more clear in your room. But we also suggest not to use too much lighting. The mirror has reflection, all of the mirror TVs have such reflection.

TV Remote with Holder

The TV remote is ip68 waterproof. Means you could put it into water, when you are taking shower in your bathtub. You have no problem for control the TV!

Serial Number

Each TV has its own ID number, it won’t be repeated which is easily for tracking the information to fix any technical problem for you.

Packing Standard

TV, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set. You can feel free to install the TV by your style.

Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 454.5W x 277.5H x 22.5Dmm/17.89″W x 10.92″H x 0.88″D

VESA Dimensions for On-wall(mm): 100 x 100 (3.93‚Äùx3.93‚Äù)

USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN USB,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN, Touchscreen USB*2,HDMI,TV,Audio, LAN

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket (NOT INCLUDED)

„ÄêIP66 Waterproof Mirror TV„Äë-Soulaca 2022 Model updated TV with IP66 waterproof, dustproof and anti-fog functions is designed for bathroom. A TV turned on and a bright single-sided transmissive mirror turned off looks luxury when installed. Based on years of experience in waterproof TV, Soulaca is continuously updating its products to be considerate and cost-effective.
„ÄêSlim Digital TV„Äë-Super narrow border out of display area and resolution 1920×1080, the TV provide high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience. Built-in Satellite with reception HDTV(ATSC) Tuner , have access to local channels. Plug in and play HDMI x 2 and USB allow directly connectivity.
„ÄêDimension & Installation„Äë-Unit Size: 501W x 316H x 43Dmm /19.7″W x 12.44″H x 1.69″D , recess dimensions for In-wall: 454.5W x 277.5H x 22.5Dmm/17.89″W x 10.92″H x 0.88″D. Can be easily recessed or surface mounted with bracket included. Installation instruction please refers to the last picture. Powered with safe DC 12V.
„ÄêShipping & Warranty„Äë Fulfill by Amazon, 2 years warranty and each of the TV has its serial number to ensure quick and accurate after-sale service. Feel free to contact Soulaca customer service, all messages will be replied within 24hours.

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4¬∞F to 149¬∞F -20¬∞C to 65¬∞C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22¬∞F to 158¬∞F -30¬∞C to 70¬∞C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85¬∞, Bottom 85¬∞, Left 80¬∞, Right 80¬∞
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
Composite video input x2 (NTSC/PAL), Stereo audio input x1, VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1, USB input x1, RF x1, HDMI input x2, Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1, IR output x1, SPDIF output x1, Headphone output x1
